name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 036
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, 4  8  15  16  23  42. Psychological experiment or world saving computer code? Colors inspired by the hit TV show LOST.
